Sentencas: Water behavior studies were performed in porous ceramic media based on proton conducting yttrium-doped barium cerate BaCe0.85Y0.15O3-alpha (BCY15), which is a component of a new high-temperature dual membrane fuel cell (dmFC) design.
Titulo: Gigantic enhancement of the dielectric permittivity in wet yttrium-doped barium cerate

Sentencas: Complex permittivity measurements were carried out on porous samples at room temperature.
Titulo: Gigantic enhancement of the dielectric permittivity in wet yttrium-doped barium cerate

Sentencas: A new phenomenon was observed during wetting-a gigantic enhancement of the real component of the capacitance at lower frequencies.
Titulo: Gigantic enhancement of the dielectric permittivity in wet yttrium-doped barium cerate

Sentencas: A possible explanation is the formation of semi-liquid layer with dipole structure on the pores walls, which is supposed to be organized also at operating temperatures.
Titulo: Gigantic enhancement of the dielectric permittivity in wet yttrium-doped barium cerate

Sentencas: Since the electrochemically active volumetric layer facilitates the water formation, it should improve the operation of the dmFC by decreasing its resistance, which is experimentally confirmed.
Titulo: Gigantic enhancement of the dielectric permittivity in wet yttrium-doped barium cerate

Sentencas: This phenomenon can be of importance also for classical proton conducting solid oxide fuel cells, as well as for operation in electrolyzer mode.
Titulo: Gigantic enhancement of the dielectric permittivity in wet yttrium-doped barium cerate
